snippet: There will be no kisses from Queen Elizabeth for Italy striker Mario Balotelli after his team wilted in the Brazilian heat against Costa Rica and slumped to a 1-0 defeat....

headline.print_headline: No Royal Kisses for Balotelli as Italy Draw a Blank
headline.main: No Royal Kisses for Balotelli as Italy Draw a Blank

lead_paragraph: There will be no kisses from Queen Elizabeth for Italy striker Mario Balotelli after his team wilted in the Brazilian heat against Costa Rica and slumped to a 1-0 defeat.
